title: PAUL says tomorrow is International SingleSpeed Day, ride Nov 2nd with one gear!
content:
Last autumn during their weekly catch-up meeting, Paul Price – the man & name behind PAUL Component Engineering – told his crew that November 2nd would from that day forth be known as International SingleSpeed Day. He had a decent reason, but singlespeeders didn’t really need much convincing to go for a ride… so all

The post PAUL says tomorrow is International SingleSpeed Day, ride Nov 2nd with one gear! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
